feed.title: Time to add CSFS to Signet?

entry.title: Time to add CSFS to Signet?
entry.summary: The discussion revolves around the consideration of signets in the context of Bitcoin development, particularly focusing on the criteria that distinguish one signet from another in terms of significance. The correspondent acknowledges the existence and utility of a signet for protocol developers to test functionalities and for users to explore as a playground. Further interest is expressed in the idea of activating LNhance on a testnet, suggesting that it would introduce an enjoyable and beneficial aspect to the testing environment. This conversation highlights the ongoing efforts within the Bitcoin development community to enhance testing frameworks, with a specific emphasis on the potential benefits of implementing the LNhance feature on a testnet.
